name: Daryabadi
text: When there happeneth Event.

name: Daryabadi
text: There is about its happening no lie.

name: Daryabadi
text: Abasing exalting.

name: Daryabadi
text: This will happen when the earth is shaken, shaken

name: Daryabadi
text: And the mountains are crumbled, crumbled.

name: Daryabadi
text: So that they become dust seattered.

name: Daryabadi
text: And ye are classes three.

name: Daryabadi
text: Those on the right hand; how happy shall those on the right hand be!

name: Daryabadi
text: And those on the left hand; how miserable shall those on the left hand be!

name: Daryabadi
text: And the preceders are the pre-ceders.

name: Daryabadi
text: Those! they shall be the brought nigh,

name: Daryabadi
text: In Gardens of Delight.

name: Daryabadi
text: A multitude from the ancients.

name: Daryabadi
text: And a few from the later generations.

name: Daryabadi
text: On couches in wrought with gold.

name: Daryabadi
text: Reclining thereon facing each other.

name: Daryabadi
text: There shall go round Unto them youths ever-young.

name: Daryabadi
text: With goblets and ewers and a cup of limpid drink.

name: Daryabadi
text: Whereby there shall be neither headiness nor will they be inebriated.

name: Daryabadi
text: And with fruit from that which they choose.

name: Daryabadi
text: And with flesh of fowls from that Which they desire.

name: Daryabadi
text: And there will be fair ones large eyed.

name: Daryabadi
text: The likes Unto pearls hidden.

name: Daryabadi
text: A recompense for that which they have been working.

name: Daryabadi
text: Therein they hear no vain or sinful discourse.

name: Daryabadi
text: Nought but the saying: peace! peace!

name: Daryabadi
text: And the fellows on the right hand; how be happy shall the fellows on the right hand be!

name: Daryabadi
text: Midst lote-trees thornless.

name: Daryabadi
text: And plantains laden with fruit.

name: Daryabadi
text: And a shade ever-spread.

name: Daryabadi
text: And water everflowing.

name: Daryabadi
text: And fruit abundant.

name: Daryabadi
text: Neither ending nor forbidden.

name: Daryabadi
text: And carpets raised.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily We! We have created those maidens by a creation.

name: Daryabadi
text: And have made them virgins.

name: Daryabadi
text: Loving, of equal age.

name: Daryabadi
text: For the fellows on the right hand.

name: Daryabadi
text: A multitude from the ancients.

name: Daryabadi
text: And a multitude from the later generations.

name: Daryabadi
text: And the fellows on the left hand; how miserable Shall the fellows on the left hand be!

name: Daryabadi
text: Amidst scorching wind and scalding water.

name: Daryabadi
text: And the shade of black smoke.

name: Daryabadi
text: Neither cool nor pleasant.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily they have been heretofore affluent.

name: Daryabadi
text: And they have been persisting in the heinous offence.

name: Daryabadi
text: And they were wont to say: when we have died and become dust and bones, shall we, then, verily be raised?

name: Daryabadi
text: We and our fathers of old?

name: Daryabadi
text: Say thou: verily the ancients and those of later generations:

name: Daryabadi
text: Are going to be assembled on the appointed time of a Day Known.

name: Daryabadi
text: Then verily ye, O ye erring, denying people.

name: Daryabadi
text: Shall surely eat of the tree of Az-Zqqum.

name: Daryabadi
text: And shall fill therewith your bellies.

name: Daryabadi
text: And shall be drinkers thereon of boiling water.

name: Daryabadi
text: Drinkers even as the drinking of thirsty camels.

name: Daryabadi
text: This shall be their entertainment on the Day of Requital.

name: Daryabadi
text: We! it is We Who created you: wherefore confess ye not?

name: Daryabadi
text: Behold! - that which ye emit.

name: Daryabadi
text: Create him ye, or are We the Creator?

name: Daryabadi
text: We! it is We Who have decreed death Unto you all. And We are not to be outrun.

name: Daryabadi
text: That We may substitute others like Unto you and produce you into that which ye know not.

name: Daryabadi
text: And assuredly ye have fully known the first Production Wherefore heed ye not?

name: Daryabadi
text: Behold! - that which ye sow.

name: Daryabadi
text: Cause it ye to grow, or are We the Grower?

name: Daryabadi
text: If We willed, surely We would make it chaff, so that ye would be left wondering.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily we are undone.

name: Daryabadi
text: Aye! we are deprived!

name: Daryabadi
text: Behold! - the water which ye drink:

name: Daryabadi
text: Send it down ye from the raincloud, or are We the Sender down?

name: Daryabadi
text: If We willed, surely We would make it brackish. Wherefore give ye not thanks?

name: Daryabadi
text: Behold! - the fire which ye strike out:

name: Daryabadi
text: Produce ye the tree thereof, or are We the Producer?

name: Daryabadi
text: We! it is We Who made it a reminder and a provision Unto the campers.

name: Daryabadi
text: Wherefore hallow thou the name of thy Lord, the Mighty.

name: Daryabadi
text: I swear by the setting of the stars -

name: Daryabadi
text: And verily that is a mighty oath, if ye but knew!

name: Daryabadi
text: That it is a Recitation honourable.

name: Daryabadi
text: In a Book Hidden.

name: Daryabadi
text: Which none can touch except the purified.

name: Daryabadi
text: It is a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.

name: Daryabadi
text: Is it this discourse that ye hold lightly?

name: Daryabadi
text: And make it your provision that ye should belie it?

name: Daryabadi
text: Wherefore then - when the soul cometh up to the wind-pipe -

name: Daryabadi
text: And ye are then looking on.

name: Daryabadi
text: And We are nigher Unto him than ye are, but ye behold not-

name: Daryabadi
text: Wherefore then, if ye are not to be requited

name: Daryabadi
text: Cause ye it not to return, if ye say sooth?

name: Daryabadi
text: Then if he be of the broughtnigh.

name: Daryabadi
text: For him shall be comfort, and fragrance and a Garden of Delight.

name: Daryabadi
text: And if he be of the fellows on the right hand,

name: Daryabadi
text: Then: peace Unto thee, for thou art of those on the right hand.

name: Daryabadi
text: And if he be of the beliers, the erring,

name: Daryabadi
text: Then an entertainment of boiling water.

name: Daryabadi
text: And roasting in a Blaze.

name: Daryabadi
text: Verily this! this is the very truth.

name: Daryabadi
text: Wherefore hallow thou the name of thy Lord, the Mighty!
